file_content.text: You have much to be proud of. The Republic has avoided a grave threat. Hopefully Malgus's creed dies with him.
And then he picked up Malgus's lightsaber and used it to cut the Emperor's throne in two!
And then she picked up Malgus's lightsaber and melted the statue's base, sending it crashing down onto Malgus!
And then they crashed a ship through the window and sent Malgus hurtling out into space!
Incredible.
Master Jedi! Cole was just regaling us with the story of how you defeated Darth Malgus.
Malgus's lightsaber form was flawless, but he let anger and desperation cloud his fighting. He faltered, and I followed through.
It was a fierce duel.
Malgus spent more time plotting his deceptions than he did studying the Force. Thankfully, my studies weren't as weak.
It came down to my skill.
Major, at last! Cole here was just relating your incredible clash against Darth Malgus.
I was pinned down. Blasters overheating. Then Malgus charged. I aimed, nice and steady, then blam! Goodbye, Malgus.
You don't know the half of it.
Is that so?
Smuggler, join us! I had no idea someone of your... well, your fight with Darth Malgus certainly sounds impressive.
There I was, blaster in each hand, sidestepping Force attacks, when Malgus lost his cool. But not me. I took the shot, and that's all she wrote.
Let the master tell it, Cole.
It's time we celebrate this momentous victory.
Finally, you've arrived. I had no idea your confrontation with Darth Malgus was so... so legendary.
It takes experience to defeat an Emperor. Now I've vanquished two.
Actually, I defeated Malgus.
Only the Force can stop a Sith Emperor.
Actually, I defeated Malgus.
It takes heavy ordnance and ingrained training to take down an Emperor.
Actually, I defeated Malgus.
Look at me. Clearly the Emperor couldn't handle my superior skills.
Actually, I defeated Malgus.
I suppose that makes sense. At any rate, we have much to celebrate.
I appreciate the adulation, but Cole wasn't even there to see our fight.
Cole's exaggerating.
I suppose I was inflating the facts just a little.
Don't worry, Cole. Enough myths will spread of this victory without your help. Now come, we have much to celebrate.
We never would have defeated Malgus by working alone.
It was a team effort.
Of course. You all deserve our praise.
It was nothing, really.
Don't be modest.
The false Emperor is dethroned. Darth Malgus is no more!
The new Empire is no more, and the old Empire is severely weakened. The Republic is destined to flourish.
The future is bright.
Indeed. You have given us much hope.
Our people deserve this moment of peace!
Long live the Republic!
Couldn't have said it better myself.
Taking down a rogue Sith Emperor is the least I could do for my Republic friends.
Don't mention it.
Your loyalty's to be commended, Captain.
Thank you, Supreme Commander.
It is I--and this council--who is honored.
Care to reward your hero?
Of course. Take care of it, Bradber.
How are the Republic's old enemies responding to Malgus's defeat?
What of the Empire?
They're still recovering from his crippling betrayal.
As always, the Republic must carry on. Our fleet requires repairs, and we must salvage what we can from the Emperor's destroyed station.
But first, the savior of the Republic deserves our praise!
But first, the saviors of the Republic deserve our praise!
Indeed. Enjoy this victory, and the peace that follows!
Our fleet's mobilizing. Good luck!
Is everyone alright?
Master Jedi, I tried to contact you....
Don't worry, Major. Looks worse than it is.
Captain! Thank goodness you're alright!
I know it looks bad, but we're fine. Most of us, anyway.
Malgus tried to kill us. Our guards stopped Darth Serevin's assassin, but they couldn't stop his bomb.
Malgus knows we're up to something. He may attempt another attack.
You must triple your security.
I'll summon more protection.
I could heal the wounded, question the assassin, anything.
How can I help?
I'm afraid the assassin didn't survive. Besides, your talents are needed elsewhere, Master Jedi.
I won't stand by while this Sith terrorizes and injures our leaders.
Malgus will answer for this.
There's only one way to stop the rogue Emperor.
We've got the wannabe Emperor backed into a corner, and he knows it.
Malgus is scared.
Then he's more dangerous than ever.
Darth Serevin wanted you all dead. If he'd succeeded....
I'm just glad you're safe.
Thank you, but we mustn't let this tragedy distract us from the mission.
We need to attack Malgus now.
Cole reported your seizure of Darth Serevin's stealth fighter. As suspected, the coordinates to Malgus's hidden base are on its computer.
Unfortunately, they're encrypted. Rather than waste days decoding them, we've worked up a quick fix.
We've placed a homing beacon on your stealth fighter. Cole will fly you to Malgus's station, and the Republic fleet will follow.
Prepare the fleet, Supreme Commander. I will lead our assault against Darth Malgus.
Let the attack begin.
Guide our fleet well, Master Jedi.
Make us proud, Major!
We'll be right behind you!
What's my goal when I enter the station?
And once I'm inside?
What's our objective when we enter the station?
And once we're inside?
Find Darth Malgus and stop him, by whatever means necessary.
Be safe, Supreme Commander.
Thank you. We'll do our best.
Report to Cantarus. He'll fly you right to Darth Malgus's doorstep.
Stop this Emperor, and you may yet become a Jedi Master. May the Force be with you.
You have defeated one Emperor, and you can do so again. May the Force be with you.
Draw strength from your encounter with the Children of the Emperor. May the Force be with you.
It goes without saying, Major, but the Republic's counting on you.
Good luck out there, Captain. You're going to need it.
Good luck, and may the Force be with you.
Report to Cantarus. Get us a stealth fighter!
The Sith is gunning for the Empire, not us.
Darth Malgus has sworn to kill every Jedi and Republic citizen before. Remember the Jedi Temple on Coruscant? I'll feel safer when he's gone.
Master Jedi, welcome. Our attack strategy could use the input of another Republic general.
Master Jedi, welcome. As the Supreme Chancellor's advisor, we could certainly use your input.
Master Jedi, welcome. Perhaps you can bring focus to our attack strategy.
Come in, Major. We could use your tactical knowledge to finalize our attack.
Captain, welcome. Our panel could use your unique perspective to finalize our attack.
You're here, excellent. Perhaps you can finalize our plan of attack.
Darth Malgus manipulated us once before. Who knows what other traps he's laid.
We must guard against deceit.
Malgus somehow heard of your confrontation with the Emperor. He's seized the Emperor's cloaked space station, departed Dromund Kaas and vanished into open space.
Malgus's new Empire may be in its infancy, but we mustn't underestimate his power.
We must respond with caution.
We've already tracked him to the Emperor's cloaked station. Unfortunately, he's departed Dromund Kaas and vanished into open space.
The longer we wait, the more time Malgus has to build his stealth armada.
We need to hit Malgus now.
Agreed, Major. But our intel's grim. Malgus has seized the Emperor's cloaked space station and fled Dromund Kaas's orbit.
Malgus is depending on Republic restraint to give him a head start.
We can't be gun shy.
No one's dragging their feet here. Malgus has gone into hiding. Stole the Emperor's cloaked space station and fled Dromund Kaas's orbit.
What's Malgus plotting?
Our Sith friend's stolen the Emperor's cloaked space station and is using it to create his stealth armada. Location unknown.
We'll never defeat Malgus if every action is planned by committee.
Talk won't win this battle.
We can't attack Malgus without his coordinates. He's stolen the Emperor's cloaked space station and fled Dromund Kaas's orbit.
Supreme Commander. Darth Malgus's forces are invading Ilum! His ships appeared from nowhere, and his forces are hitting both sides!
Deploy every available soldier. The Republic will not lose this planet!
Malgus must have sent stealth fighters from his armada. Which means we can steal one.
We can take an invading ship.
Of course. A command fighter will have the location of Malgus's space station logged in its nav computer.
What's Malgus after? Why fight a two-front war?
Why would he invade Ilum?
The Adegan crystal deposits. He needs them to finish construction of his stealth fleet.
This is what happens when you waste time in debate.
We've delayed too long.
You can assign blame later.
One of the invading ships must have coordinates to the station in its nav computer.
It's our best hope. Steal one of the ships, and a good pilot could follow the flight plans back to Malgus's base.
We don't know how long the stealth ships will stay on Ilum.
We should hurry.
Agreed. Bring up Cantarus.
One ship won't stand much chance against a space station and an Imperial fleet.
And when I get there?
We'll take care of that when the time comes. First, you'll need a pilot, and I know just the man.
Not to brag, but I've pulled off a few pretty impressive maneuvers in my day.
A good pilot? I'm great.
We'll need you for more than flying duty. Besides, I know a grade A pilot with time on his hands.
I've never flown an Imperial fleet ship before.
I'd need a pilot.
Don't worry. I know the perfect man for the job.
Your starfighter's ready, Supreme Commander.
Change of plans, Cantarus. The good Master Jedi needs help borrowing a stealth fighter. Once it's secure, you're both flying it to Malgus's space station.
Change of plans, Cantarus. The major here needs your assistance confiscating a stealth fighter. Then you're both flying it to Malgus's space station.
Change of plans, Cantarus. You're going to help our friend steal a stealth fighter. Then you're both flying it to Malgus's space station.
Change of plans, Cantarus. Our friends need someone to steal a stealth fighter, then fly them to Malgus's space station. You just volunteered.
I'm always glad to fight beside the CorSec captain who helped me free Corellia.
Good to see you again, Cole.
When I heard you were leading the charge, I couldn't resist signing up.
I didn't know you could fly, Cole.
You're a pilot?
Flying's in every Corellian's blood, especially us CorSec captains.
Let's show Darth Malgus what it means to threaten the Republic.
Nice to meet you.
I can't wait.
Taking down Darth Malgus isn't going to be easy.
You ready for this, Cantarus?
I was born ready.
Time to steal us a ship.
Let's steal this stealth ship.
The Republic thanks you, Cantarus. Now prep for battle.
He'll drop you on the front lines. Once you've landed, there's only two armies between you and the stealth fighters in Malgus's fort.
I sense a dark power descending on Ilum. Whoever leads this invasion will be here soon. May the Force be with you.
We must hold Ilum at all cost.
